message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Could you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $100. I'm willing to come down to $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I'm glad we're close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $130, but that's my final offer. I really need to make a sale today.
I'm getting close to your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
